item.title: Systemd and docker container
item.description: One of my docker host run several containers, e.g. Redis and Nginx, and a manually start container is needed when the host is rebooted. Systemd is ideally to handle such service, but it’s not idea that write systemd script per container. However, a feature in systemd is the template unit file, which can help to resolve such cases. What are template unit files? Template unit files allow systemd to address multiple units from a single configuration file.
